member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.Resources.BigTiffExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to It seems what report is too big for uncompressed tiff, try to change CompressionScheme property from None..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.Resources.CreateBitmapExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The size of the bitmap is too large that there is not enough memory in system can be allocated to the bitmap..

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.TiffExportException
member.summary: Exception raised when internal error.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.TiffExportException.ErrorCode
member.summary: The error code.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.TiffExport
member.summary: For internal use only.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.Fonts
member.summary: Specifies custom fonts settings.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme
member.summary: Used to specify the compression schemed used in the resulting tiff image of the component.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme.None
member.summary: Specifies no compression.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme.Rle
member.summary: Specifies the RLE compression scheme

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme.Ccitt3
member.summary: Specifies the CCITT3 compression scheme.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme.Ccitt4
member.summary: Specifies the CCITT4 compression scheme.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme.Lzw
member.summary: Specifies the LZW compression scheme. This compression can be used for for 1, 4, and 8 bit color depths.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.TiffSettings
member.summary: Export settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.TiffSettings.CompressionScheme
member.summary: Specifies the compression scheme to be used when exporting a TIFF file.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.TiffSettings.Dither
member.summary: Specifies whether the image should be dithered when saving to a black and white output format such as CCITT3. If is RLE or None (indicating color output) this property has no effect.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.TiffSettings.DpiX
member.summary: Get or set the horizonal resolution value when exporting a TIFF.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Export.Tiff.Section.TiffSettings.DpiY
member.summary: Get or set the vertical resolution value when exporting a TIFF.
